title: PyTorch ONNX Tests are Outdated.
body_html:
In short, the pytorch ONNX tests are outdated and need to be updated to the new API.

For example in this file, we are still using Variable.

Or here we use log_softmax without an explicit dim=1 argument.

I can work on this if permitted.
body_text:
In short, the pytorch ONNX tests are outdated and need to be updated to the new API.
For example in this file, we are still using Variable.
Or here we use log_softmax without an explicit dim=1 argument.

body:
In short, the pytorch ONNX tests are outdated and need to be updated to the new API.

For example in this [file](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/onnx/test_pytorch_onnx_caffe2.py), we are still using Variable.

Or [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/onnx/model_defs/mnist.py) we use log_softmax without an explicit `dim=1` argument.

I can work on this if permitted.
